timeline.message: Create a baseline for host mapping hack
Remove redundant const definition from AndroidEmbeddedBuilderTemplate
Remove host parameter from client methods

timeline.bodyText: Why do we need to filter for ObjectSchema? Does this have an -ve impact on the way core java-gen produces code?
timeline.author: anuchandy
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -71,6 +71,7 @@ public Client map(CodeModel codeModel) {
                 .flatMap(og -> og.getOperations().stream())
                 .flatMap(o -> o.getExceptions().stream())
                 .map(Response::getSchema)
+                .filter(s -> s instanceof ObjectSchema)

replies.bodyText:
Because there is a down case two lines after

.map(s -> Mappers.getExceptionMapper().map((ObjectSchema) s))

which will fail when Response:getSchema returns String.
replies.author: JianpingChen

timeline.bodyText: What makes android different from Java which requires special handling for string type?
timeline.author: anuchandy

replies.bodyText:
On Android we'd throw this exception.

com.azure.android.core.http.exception.HttpResponseException

For normal Java, it'll throw

com.azure.core.exception.HttpResponseException
replies.author: JianpingChen
